kjv_def: (even) as, conversation, (+ like) manner, (+ by any) means, way
strongs_def: a turn, i.e. (by implication) mode or style (especially with preposition or relative prefix as adverb, like); figuratively, deportment or character
outline:
1. a manner, way, fashion
    1. as, even as, like as
  2. manner of life, character, deportment
